conversations.body_text: Hi Juan Jose Chavez Fuentes,    We apologize that the Pro X Ultra is currently out of stock at our US warehouse. We expect it to arrive at Warehouse 2 next week and will ship it to you then. We sincerely apologize for the delay this may cause.

Hi,

Is there an estimated delivery date for the haptic motors? The website
doesn't show any progress since 12/13. Is there a US tracking number?

Also, was the baseplate shipped in a different package?

Regards,

Jose Chavez

On Fri, Dec 5, 2025, 2:03 AM service@simsonn.com
Hi Juan Jose Chavez Fuentes,    Yes, the base plate was dispatched separately. Here is your logistics tracking number: 887038674808

Hi,

Is there a local tracking number for the haptic motors? The SFExpress
doesn't show any movement since Dec 13th. It seems to be stuck in Wood
Dale, IL.

Thank you,

On Mon, Dec 22, 2025, 6:27 AM service@simsonn.com
Hi Juan Jose Chavez Fuentes,    Here is your local logistics tracking link and tracking number.  https://oms.tooexp.com/tracking.html  TEP00106942893

Hi,

I have not received the package yet, it shows in the website it is still in
the same city from several days ago. Is this normal? Has this been lost?

Regards,

On Tue, Dec 23, 2025, 4:54 AM service@simsonn.com

Following up on this.

Thank you,

On Mon, Dec 29, 2025, 8:57 PM Juan Jose Chavez Fuentes <
j.josechavezf.us@gmail.com> wrote:

> Hi,
>
> I have not received the package yet, it shows in the website it is still
> in the same city from several days ago. Is this normal? Has this been lost?
>
> Regards,
